attributes.action: Illegal immigrants must not be allowed to vote in any general elections
attributes.additional_details:
The currant government is corrupt and it is illegal to stop us from voting. They are only doing this to benefit them. 
They are suppose to work for the people in the UK. (Not illegals arriving on boats or any other means of transport)
attributes.background: They must not allow illegal immigrants the right to vote in any elections whatsoever. Now or in the future. Only people born in the UK or have lived here over 25 years must get to vote.

rejection.details: Illegal immigrants are already unable to vote.
